Description :
  In Memoria intertwined stories of two characters with whom the player goes through the different eras. Saja, princess from the South, dreams of making a military feat, and catcher bird from another time Jeroen tries to break the curse of his beloved. Gameplay combines style point & click heroes and magic skills. Saja, princess from the South, has an insatiable desire to become the greatest hero of military history. Therefore, it becomes a party to most major war ever happens in Aventura - the war mages, which unfolds in the midst of a barren desert. 

Catcher birds Jeroen lives almost 450 years after the Great War. Nuri, the love of life Gerona, was a curse, because of which she turned into a crow. To return to her human form, Gerona need to find a mysterious merchant Fahy, who has magical powers. However Fahy help Gerona only after he guesses the puzzle that the merchant had a dream. Searching for an answer to the riddle soon lead to a series of events that twist of fate Saji and Gerona, threatening to turn the moment into just dim reflection of long-forgotten past.
